author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3294 - further refinement of dispose on security exception, now only on connection attempts. A security exception on an authenticated connection is reported back to the client and remains intact. Made use of inactivitymonitor w useKeepAlive=false to abort dos style hogging connections

author: gtully
msg: add some context to the intermittent failure, issue is ioexception from store being treated as transport failure, if the error ocurrs on a ack commit we can expect a redelivery that won't come and fail the test

author: mnuttall
msg: Aries-893: org.apache.aries.subsystem.ctt.itests.SubsystemDependency_4CTest fails. Change 4A and 4B to check that no _new_ bundles get provisioned, regardless of how many we started with.

author: angela
msg: OAK-215 : Make definition of ItemDelegate#getParent permission aware
